lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin insisted on running at the national championships in June, even after USA Track & Field officials asked him to withdraw because of his positive drug test from a meet in April, a person with knowledge of the meeting said yesterday. The person was granted anonymity because of the sensitive nature of the information.
